Name: Puzzle Monarch: Egypt
About the game: An ancient tomb has been uncovered and it's filled with hidden treasures. Solve 15 sets of ancient puzzles and unlock your way to the bottom of the tomb. Each set contains a three by three and six by six puzzle. To move on to the next level you will have to solve both puzzles and journey deeper into the tomb. Each puzzle is randomly created so you can enjoy replaying with a new experience each play through. In Puzzle Monarch Egypt you will enjoy hours of puzzle solving with Egypt themed art. Run into a hard puzzle? Use the hint button at any time to overlay the finished puzzle and help you get your bearings. In Puzzle Monarch Egypt the treasures are waiting for a true puzzle solver like you! FEATURES: 15 Levels 3x3 Puzzles 6x6 Puzzles 30 Puzzles total Random Puzzle Creation Hint Helper
